biotools.summary: Database and analysis platform for pathogenic E. coli transcriptional gene regulatory networks. The database contains the known regulatory network of E. coli K-12 extracted from RegulonDB. In addition, it provides inter-species transferred gene regulatory interactions for 16 pathogenic E. coli strains.

bioschemas.name: EhecRegNet
